docs.snippet: OFFICIALS of the Intercontinental Hotels Corporation and of the Latin-American interests, which are now cooperating in building eleven hotels in Central and South American cities, are already contemplating a similar chain of resort hotels.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Aug. 3 (U.P.) -- Congress today decreed national mourning for President Tomas Berreta, who died here last night at Qie age of 71. A State funeral will be held tomorrow.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Aug. 5 -- The United Nations Economic and Social Council today appointed a committee of seven nations to report whether Chile's proposal for the creation of an economic commission for Latin America should be referred to the...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y., Aug. 5 -- The United Nations Economic and Social Council today appointed a committee of seven nations to report whether Chile's proposal for the creation of an economic commission for Latin America should be referred to the Inter-American Conference, wnich meets at Bogota, Colombia, next January.
docs.abstract: proposal discussed, Econ and Soc Council

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 7 -- Within twenty-four hours the Argentine Foreign Office has announced the "adherence" of the Holy See and of the United States to the July 7 "peace plan" of Foreign Minister Juan A. Bramuglia, which was heard on the broadcast...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 7 -- Within twenty-four hours the Argentine Foreign Office has announced the "adherence" of the Holy See and of the United States to the July 7 "peace plan" of Foreign Minister Juan A. Bramuglia, which was heard on the broadcast message of President Juan D. Peron the previous day.
docs.abstract: US and Vatican announces adherence to Peron peace plea made in July

docs.snippet: The strike of Atlantic and Gulf Coast shipyard workers entered its seventh week yesterday with no sign of a settlement between employers and the Industrial Union of Marine and Shipbuilding Workers of America, CIO.
